aboutMe: Dynamic technology leader with over 10 years of experience managing international cross-functional teams and driving strategic projects in the IT, Automotive, and sustainable AgTech industries. Expertise in spearheading Digital Transformation, enhancing Enterprise Systems, and delivering Innovative solutions.

tasks: Position executed in parallel with Agro Electronics Business Unit Manager, reporting to CEO
Manage and execute ITOps (Python + JS for API integration) with IT specialist team. 6 tools (GIS and IoT oriented) implemented and deployed for an annual time saving over 2400h
Spearheaded the successful integration of ERP, Online Marketplace and Logistics post-M&A, ensuring seamless ERP data consolidation in 6 months
Managed a multidisciplinary team of IT specialists (1 internal, 10 external), enhancing system performance and operational efficiency across the organization
Achieved a 17% reduction in operational downtime by optimizing IT operations and implementing advanced monitoring tools
Led the deployment and continuous improvement of IT infrastructure, ensuring robust cybersecurity measures with reduction on Cybersecurity alerts up to 50%
Reporting to CEO and member of Innovation Comitee in European team (including PMO lead)

Directed the development of innovative AgTech solutions, integrating webGIS, IoT, AI, and cloud services to enhance product offerings. From Market Research and Business Plan development to Portfolio preparation for 4 dierent product lines, 3 of them currently in market
Managed cross-functional teams of over 30 professionals across Europe, driving projects that aligned with company strategy and market needs

Oversaw the successful launch of IoT-based pest control systems, reducing pesticide usage by 80% and reducing cost to customer circa 50% by providing pheromone optimized application by integrating geospatial IOT data
